Ladder Cable Trays & Accessories in Africa


Ladder Tray


The ladder type cable tray is suitable for mounting large quantities of heavy duty power cables. As per design, the ladder cable tray provides high strength, making it suitable for heavy-duty power distribution in industries produced with pre-galvanized mild steel.
Default Length - 2500mm.
Finish - Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated, Painted and Hot Dip Galvanised as per IS- 2629.
Height - 40mm,50mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 100mm,150mm, 300mm,450mm,600mm,750mm and 1000mm.
Thickness -1.6mm to 3mm.

Ask for Quotation


Tee


Tee in

ladder type Cable Tray Accessories,

Tee bend is used to get another route or Cable Tray running from 2 paths to 1 path. As per requirement, tee bend can be made to any degree and can be from large to small, small to large in any dimension. Tee bending is used to horizontally transfer cable trays to take another route. As per Cable Tray size, tee bend can be available in any size.


Default Length - 2500mm.
Finish - Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated, Painted and Hot Dip Galvanised as per IS- 2629.
Height - 40mm,50mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 100mm,150mm, 300mm,450mm,600mm,750mm and 1000mm.
Thickness -1.6mm to 3mm.

Ask for Quotation


Horizontal Bend


Horizontal Bend in

Ladder Type cable tray

Are Mainly Used In Conjunction With ladder Cable Type Trays To Route The Cable In 90 Degrees Where Two Walls Connect With Vertical Pillar Restriction Or Obstacle To It, Our Product Design Enables The Cable To Route Properly And Bend Chamfer Take Care Of Cable Not To Worn Out, Peel Off Or Get Damage During Cable Laying.

Default Length - 2500mm.
Finish - Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated, Painted and Hot Dip Galvanised as per IS- 2629.
Height - 40mm,50mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 100mm,150mm, 300mm,450mm,600mm,750mm and 1000mm.
Thickness -1.6mm to 3mm.

Ask for Quotation


Vertical Bend


Vertical bend in ladder type cable tray is primarily used to route the cable where the path switches to a different plane in conjunction with perforated cable type trays.
Default Length - 2500mm.
Finish - Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated, Painted and Hot Dip Galvanised as per IS- 2629.
Height - 40mm,50mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 100mm,150mm, 300mm,450mm,600mm,750mm and 1000mm.
Thickness -1.6mm to 3mm.

Ask for Quotation


Vertical Inward Bend


Vertical inward bend in ladder type cable tray shifts upward direction from the horizontal plane. Our product design helps the cable to properly route and bend the chamfer to take care of cable not to worn out, peel off or get damaged during cable layout.
Default Length - 2500mm.
Finish - Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated, Painted and Hot Dip Galvanised as per IS- 2629.
Height - 40mm,50mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 100mm,150mm, 300mm,450mm,600mm,750mm and 1000mm.
Thickness -1.6mm to 3mm.

Ask for Quotation


Vertical Outward Bend


The vertical outward bend in the cable tray moves outward from the vertical plane. Our product design allows the cable to properly route and bend the chamfer to take care of cable during cable layout not to be worn out, peel off or get damaged.
Default Length - 2500mm.
Finish - Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated, Painted and Hot Dip Galvanised as per IS- 2629.
Height - 40mm,50mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 100mm,150mm, 300mm,450mm,600mm,750mm and 1000mm.
Thickness -1.6mm to 3mm.

Ask for Quotation

FAQ:

A: Cable ladder systems and cable tray systems are designed for use as supports for cables and not as enclosures giving full mechanical protection.Ladder Cable Tray systems consists of two longitudinal side members connected by individual transverse members, and is designed for use as a power cable or control cable support system. Ladder and ventilated trays may have solid covers to protect cables from falling objects, dust, and water.
A: You can save installation labour and material costs since cable ladder has increased cable fill compared to other wiring methods.There’s an increased in conductor ampacity because cable ladder has full ventilation that provide big savings in the costs of conductor.Cable ladder occupies less space rather permits greater spacing between the support hangers, requiring less labour compared to similar conduit and wire system.
A: There are mainly two types of tee used in ladder cable trays i.e Vertical Tee and Horizontal Tee.
A: cable ladders are preferred for supporting high volume or heavy cabling, especially if there are long spans between supports.While cable trays are typically used for light weight cable support, in addition to instrumentation and tubing.
